roleset.name: (cause to) be defective

example.name: passive
example.text: But Kenneth Leon , a telecommunications analyst with Bear , Stearns & Co. , finds the BellSouth proposal still flawed because the company does n't have to wait five years to begin buying more LIN shares .

propbank.arg: because the company does n't have to wait five years to begin buying more LIN shares

example.name: Adjectival rel: flawed
example.text: I kinda expected more Jedis to be out there , although in all honesty , I would say that I have n't actually seen anyone wielding a lightsaber , so that may be flawed .

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: That 's its power and its flaw .
